mapper.sql: id, match_code, match_name, unit_code, unit_name, enroll_total_count, organizer_count, official_count, apply_time, apply_time_day, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.insert:
insert into report_match_source
id,
match_code,
match_name,
unit_code,
unit_name,
enroll_total_count,
organizer_count,
official_count,
apply_time,
apply_time_day,
gmt_create,
gmt_modified,

mapper.update:
update report_match_source
match_code = #{matchCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
match_name = #{matchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit_code = #{unitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enroll_total_count = #{enrollTotalCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
organizer_count = #{organizerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
official_count = #{officialCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
apply_time = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
apply_time_day = #{applyTimeDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update report_match_source set match_code = #{matchCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, match_name = #{matchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_code = #{unitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enroll_total_count = #{enrollTotalCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, organizer_count = #{organizerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, official_count = #{officialCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, apply_time = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, apply_time_day = #{applyTimeDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select match_code as matchCode,match_name as matchName,SUM(enroll_total_count) as counts from report_match_source where 1=1 GROUP BY match_code order by counts desc limit 0,5
select match_code as matchCode,match_name as matchName,SUM(official_count) as counts from report_match_source where 1=1 GROUP BY match_code order by counts desc limit 0,5
SELECT apply_time as applyTime,unit_code as unitCode ,unit_name as name,SUM(organizer_count) as value from report_match_source group by unit_code
